detaileddescription.para: The number of shared memory OpenMP threads
OpenMP locks for atomic scalar flux updates
A buffer for temporary scalar flux updates for each thread

briefdescription.para: Allocates memory for track boundary angular fluxes and leakages flat source region scalar fluxes.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes memory for old flux arrays if they were allocated from previous simulation.

briefdescription.para: Allocates memory for flat source region source arrays.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes memory for old source arrays if they were allocated from previous simulation.

briefdescription.para: Allocates memory for flat source region power arrays.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes memory for power arrays if they were allocated from previous simulation.

briefdescription.para: Creates a polar quadrature object for the solver.
Pre-computes exponential pre-factors for each segment of each track for each polar angle.

detaileddescription.para: This method will generate a hashmap which contains values of the prefactor for specific segment lengths (the keys into the hashmap).

briefdescription.para: Initializes the volumes and material arrays for each flat source region.

detaileddescription.para: This method assigns each flat source region a unique, monotonically increasing ID, sets the material for each flat source region, and assigns a volume based on the cumulative length of all of the segments inside the flat source region.

briefdescription.para: Zero each track's boundary fluxes for each energy group and polar angle in the "forward" and "reverse" directions.
Set the scalar flux for each energy group inside each flat source region to a constant value.

parameterdescription.para: the value to assign to each flat source region flux

briefdescription.para: Set the source for each energy group inside each flat source region to a constant value.

parameterdescription.para: the value to assign to each flat source region source

briefdescription.para: Normalizes all flat source region scalar fluxes and track boundary angular fluxes to the total fission source (times $ \nu $).
Computes the total source (fission and scattering) in each flat source region.

simplesect.para: the residual between this source and the previous source

briefdescription.para: Computes the contribution to the flat source region scalar flux from a single track segment.

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to the segment of interest
a pointer to the track's angular flux
a pointer to the temporary flat source region flux buffer

briefdescription.para: Updates the boundary flux for a track given boundary conditions.

parameterdescription.para: the ID number for the track of interest
the track direction (forward - true, reverse - false)
a pointer to the track's outgoing angular flux

briefdescription.para: Add the source term contribution in the transport equation to the flat source region scalar flux.
Compute $ k_{eff} $ from total fission and absorption rates.
This method performs one transport sweep of all azimuthal angles, tracks, segments, polar angles and energy groups.
Computes the exponential term in the transport equation for a track segment.

parameterdescription.para: the total group cross-section at this energy
the length of the line segment projected in the xy-plane

briefdescription.para: Constructor initializes array pointers for tracks and materials.

detaileddescription.para:
The constructor retrieves the number of energy groups and flat source regions and azimuthal angles from the geometry and track generator. The constructor initalizes the number of threads to a default of 1.
geometry
an optional pointer to the geometry
track_generator
an optional pointer to the trackgenerator

briefdescription.para: Destructor deletes array for OpenMP atomic locks for scalar flux updates, and calls Solver subclass destructor to deletes arrays for fluxes and sources.
Returns the number of shared memory OpenMP threads in use.
Returns the scalar flux for some energy group for a flat source region.

parameterdescription.para: the ID for the FSR of interest

simplesect.para: the flat source region scalar flux

briefdescription.para: Return an array indexed by flat source region IDs and energy groups which contains the corresponding fluxes for each flat source region.

simplesect.para: an array of flat source region scalar fluxes

briefdescription.para: Return an array indexed by flat source region IDs with the corresponding flat source region power.

simplesect.para: an array of flat source region powers

briefdescription.para: Return an array indexed by flat source region IDs with the corresponding pin cell power.

simplesect.para: an array of flat source region pin powers

briefdescription.para: Sets the number of shared memory OpenMP threads to use (>0).
Compute the fission rates in each flat source region and stores them in an array indexed by flat source region ID.
This a subclass of the Solver class for multi-core CPUs using OpenMP multi-threading.
